modules.name: Analogue Shift Register
modules.description: A dual 4, or single 8, step shift register

modules.name: Attenuator
modules.description: Dual attenuator with attenuverting option

modules.name: Binary Sequencer
modules.description: Binary counter based sequencer

modules.name: Boolean AND Gate
modules.description: 4 input boolean AND/NAND gate

modules.name: Boolean OR Gate
modules.description: 4 input boolean OR/NOR gate

modules.name: Boolean VC Inverter
modules.description: Dual voltage controlled logical inverter

modules.name: Boolean XOR Gate
modules.description: 4 input boolean XOR/XNOR gate

modules.name: Burst Generator
modules.description: Generates bursts of 1-16 pulses whenever a trigger is received at the trigger input

modules.name: Comparator
modules.description: Compares the input signal with either an internal or external threshold value and outputs gate signals based on the outcome.

modules.name: CV Spreader
modules.description: Accepts "Base" and "Spread" CV inputs and creates a set of new CV values that are spread either side of the base value by an amount determined by the spread value.

modules.name: Event Arranger
modules.description: A VCV Rack implementation of the VC Clock and Event Arranger published in an article by John Blacet in the Jan/Feb edition of Synapse magazine

modules.name: Gate Delay
modules.description: A dual gate delay line giving up to 40 seconds of delay with voltage control over the delay time

modules.name: Gate Modifier
modules.description: Voltage controlled gate length modifier

modules.name: gate to Trigger Converter
modules.description: Description.

modules.name: Mangler
modules.description: A voltage controlled sample rate/bit depth reducer

modules.name: Manual CV Generator
modules.description: A simple dual manual CV generator offering +/- 10V with both coarse and fine controls

modules.name: Manual Gate
modules.description: A manually triggered gate generator offering a number of simultaneous gate and inverted gate outputs

modules.name: Matrix Mixer
modules.description: A 4 x 4 matrix mixer allowing up to 4 input signals to be independently mixed to 4 different outputs

modules.name: Minimus Maximus
modules.description: A signal processor that determines and outputs the minimum, maximum and mean (average) of up to 4 input signals

modules.name: Mixer
modules.description: A basic 4 input utility mixer with output level control, overload indicator, inverted output and selectable bipolar/unipolar operation

modules.name: Morph Shaper
modules.description: Morphing controller and wave shaper

modules.name: Multiplexer
modules.description: A 1 input to 8 output and 8 input to 1 output multiplexer

modules.name: Mute
modules.description: A voltage controlled mute

modules.name: Mute-iple
modules.description: A dual 4-way/ Single 8 way mutable multiple

modules.name: Polyrhythmic Generator  (Deprecated - Do Not Use)
modules.description: This module is no longer supported - use Polyrhythmic Generator MkII instead

modules.name: Rectifier
modules.description: A full/half wave rectifier with variable rectification axis

modules.name: Sample & Hold
modules.description: Sample and Hold/Track and hold

modules.name: Shepard Generator
modules.description: Generates a set of 8 ramp and sawtooth control signals appropriately phased for generation of Shepard tones

modules.name: SR Flip Flop
modules.description: A logical Set/Reset flip flop with enable

modules.name: Dual 8 Step Sequencer
modules.description: Fully featured dual channel 8 step sequencer

modules.name: T Flip Flop
modules.description: A logical T type (toggle) flip flop with enable

modules.name: Trigger Sequencer (8 Step)
modules.description: Quad 8 step trigger sequencer

modules.name: Trigger Sequencer (16 Step)
modules.description: Quad 16 step trigger sequencer

modules.name: Tapped Gate Delay
modules.description: A gate delay that offers up to 40 seconds of delay with tapped outputs at equal intervals along the delay line

modules.name: Voltage Controlled Frequency Divider (Deprecated - Do Not Use)
modules.description: This module is no longer supported - use VC Frequency Divider instead

modules.name: Voltage Controlled Polarizer
modules.description: A dual voltage controlled polarizer

modules.name: Voltage Controlled Switch
modules.description: Selects between 2 inputs or routes 1 input to one of 2 outputs based on the level of the signal at the CV input

modules.name: Voltage Inverter
modules.description: A quad voltage inverter that inverts signals around zero

modules.name: Basic 8 Step Sequencer
modules.description: Basic single channel 8 step sequencer

modules.name: Sequencer CV Expander
modules.description: 8 step sequencer expander adding an extra channel of CV output

modules.name: Sequencer Output Expander
modules.description: 8 step sequencer expander adding a gate output for each step

modules.name: Sequencer Trigger Expander
modules.description: 8 step sequencer expander adding a an extra channel of gate/trigger output

modules.name: Sub Harmonic Generator
modules.description: Fatten up a single oscillator with sub harmonics

modules.name: Voltage Controlled Frequency Divider MkII
modules.description: Frequency divider with a variable and voltage controlled division ratio from 1 to around 20

modules.name: Polyrhythmic Generator MkII
modules.description: A set of 8 voltage controlled clock dividers that can be used to generate polyrhythms by clocking and/or dividing at different rates

modules.name: Gated Comparator
modules.description: Gated Comparator

modules.name: Slope Detector
modules.description: Slope Detector

modules.name: Gated Comparator Expander - Random Melody
modules.description: Gated Comparator expander adding Random Melody output (also works with other sequencers)

modules.name: Gated Comparator Expander - Gate Logic
modules.description: Gated Comparator expander adding logical mixing of the shift register outputs

modules.name: Startup Delay
modules.description: Generates delayed start signals for sequencers on load or startup

modules.name: Left Hand Rack Ear
modules.description: A Left Hand Rack Ear

modules.name: Right Hand Rack Ear
modules.description: A Right Hand Rack Ear

modules.name: Blank Panel - 2HP
modules.description: 2HP blanking panel

modules.description: 4HP blanking panel

modules.description: 8HP blank panel

modules.description: 16HP blank panel

modules.name: Offset Generator
modules.description: Offsets a CV signal by a given amount

modules.name: Single Bernoulli Gate
modules.description: Randomized routing of gate signals

modules.name: Fade-in/Fade-out and Record Controller
modules.description: Automated fade in/out with integrated start/stop control for the VCV Record module

modules.name: Fade-in/Fade-out Expander
modules.description: Adds sequencer start/stop and envelope outputs to the fade controller

modules.description: Adds gate outputs to the 8 and 16 Step Trigger Sequencers

modules.name: Voltage Controlled Pulse Divider
modules.description: Voltage controlled division of pulse signals such as gates and triggers

modules.name: Clocked Random Gates
modules.description: Generates a set of 8 synchronised gates and triggers

modules.name: Clocked Random Gate CV Expander
modules.description: Generates CV based on the state of the random gates

modules.name: Clocked Random Gate Logic Expander
modules.description: Logical processing of the gates from the Clocked Random Gates module

modules.name: Euclidean Sequencer
modules.description: Algorithmic trigger sequencer based on Euclidean division

modules.name: Euclidean Sequencer Expander
modules.description: CV Expander for the Euclidean Sequencer

modules.name: Voltage Scaler
modules.description: Rescale a voltage from one range to another

modules.name: Polyphonic Min/Max
modules.description: Determines minimum and maximum values from a polyphonic CV input

modules.name: Breakout
modules.description: Breaks polyphonic signals out to individual normalled output/input pairs

modules.description: An 8 Channel 8 Step Gate/Trigger Sequencer

modules.description: An 8 Channel 16 Step Gate/Trigger Sequencer

modules.description: Polyphonic Manual/VC Mute

modules.description: 16 Step Sequencer

modules.description: 8 Step Sequencer

modules.description: Adds another channel to the 16 Step Sequencer

modules.name: 8 Step Sequencer Channel Expander
modules.description: Adds another channel to the 8 Step Sequencer

modules.name: Master Reset Controller
modules.description: Master reset button and clock wrangler

modules.name: Polyphonic Bernoulli Gate
modules.description: Randomized routing of polyphonic gate signals

modules.name: Polyphonic Voltage Controlled Switch
modules.description: Selects between 2 polyphonic inputs or routes 1 polyphonic input to one of 2 polyphonic outputs based on the level of the signal at the polyphonic CV input

modules.description: A polyphonic voltage controlled polarizer

modules.name: Polyphonic Boolean Logic Processor
modules.description: Applies boolean logic across the channels of a polyphonic signal

modules.name: Polyphonic Manual CV Generator
modules.description: A basic manual CV generator with a range of output voltages

modules.name: Signal Manifold
modules.description: Replicates a mono/poly input signal to a selected number of channels in a poly output signal

modules.description: Adds individual gate outputs to the 8 Step Sequencer

modules.description: Adds individual gate outputs to the 16 Step Sequencer
